peripheral.name: TIMER
peripheral.description: Programmable Timers. See EE User's Manual, Chapter 4.

field.name: COUNT
field.description: Counter Value. The counter value is incremented according to the conditions of the clock and the gate signal specified in the Tn_MODE.

register.name: T0_MODE
register.description: Register for setting modes and reading status

enumeratedValue.name: LOW
enumeratedValue.description: Counts while the gate signal is low.

enumeratedValue.name: RISING
enumeratedValue.description: Resets and starts counting at the gate signal's rising edge.

enumeratedValue.name: FALLING
enumeratedValue.description: Resets and starts counting at the gate signal's falling edge.

enumeratedValue.name: BOTH
enumeratedValue.description: Resets and starts counting at both edges of the gate signal.

enumeratedValue.name: Disabled
enumeratedValue.description: The counter keeps counting, ignoring the reference value.

enumeratedValue.name: Enabled
enumeratedValue.description: The counter is cleared to 0 when the counter value is equal to the reference value.

enumeratedValue.name: Enabled
enumeratedValue.description: An interrupt is generated when the counter value is equal to the reference value.

enumeratedValue.name: Disabled
enumeratedValue.description: An overflow interrupt is not generated.

enumeratedValue.name: Enabled
enumeratedValue.description: An interrupt is generated when an overflow occurs.

field.name: COMP
field.description: Compare Value. Reference value to be compared with Tn_COUNT.

field.name: HOLD
field.description: Hold Value. The value of Tn_COUNT is copied when an SBUS interrupt occurs.

register.name: T1_MODE
register.description: Register for setting modes and reading status

register.name: T2_MODE
register.description: Register for setting modes and reading status

register.name: T3_MODE
register.description: Register for setting modes and reading status

peripheral.name: IPU
peripheral.description: Image Data Processor. See EE User's Manual, Chapter 8.

register.name: IPU_CMD
register.description: IPU Decoded-code read register / command register

field.name: OPTION
field.description: Command Option. Contents differ depending on executed command.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLE
enumeratedValue.description: DATA field disabled (VDEC / FDEC still in execution.)

field.name: IFC
field.description: Input FIFO counter. Same as IPU_BP IFC field.

field.name: ECD
field.description: Error code detection. Set to 0 when a new command is issued, then set to 1 if an error is encountered.

field.name: SCD
field.description: Start code detection. Set to 0 when a new command is issued, then set to 1 if a start code is encountered.

enumeratedValue.name: INTRA_MACRO_BLOCK
enumeratedValue.description: 2-dimensional VLC table specially for intra macro block.

field.name: RST
field.description: Reset. Writing 1 will force-abandon the current command and data, and reset the IPU.

field.name: BP
field.description: Bit stream pointer to bit position in first 128-bit data to start decoding.

field.name: IFC
field.description: Input FIFO counter. Equal to number of qwords in IPU_in_FIFO.

field.name: FP
field.description: FIFO pointer. Equal to number of qwords remaining in IPU except IPU_in_FIFO.

register.name: IPU_TOP
register.description: Reads the first 32 bits of the bit stream after execution of a BDEC / IDEC / VDEC / FDEC command completes.

field.name: BSTOP
field.description: Top 32 bits of the bit stream data.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLE
enumeratedValue.description: BSTOP field is enabled (ready to read.)

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLE
enumeratedValue.description: BSTOP field is disabled (decoding still in execution.)

peripheral.name: GIF
peripheral.description: GS Interface. See EE User's Manual, Chapter 7.

enumeratedValue.name: RESET
enumeratedValue.description: When set, the GIF is reset and the internal register returns to the initial value.

enumeratedValue.name: TRANSFER_RESTART
enumeratedValue.description: Restarts transfer processing. When set, the other GIF registers can no longer be read.

enumeratedValue.name: TEMP_STOP
enumeratedValue.description: Temporarily stops transfer processing. When set, allows reading the other GIF registers for debugging.

enumeratedValue.name: MASK
enumeratedValue.description: Enables the PATH3 mask. If set during a transmission, the mask is enabled after the end of transmission.

enumeratedValue.name: INTERMITTENT_TRANSFER_MODE
enumeratedValue.description: Intermittent transfer mode in every 8 qwords.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLE
enumeratedValue.description: Disabled (Masked by the MR3 flag of the GIF_MODE register.)

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLE
enumeratedValue.description: Disabled (Masked by the VIF MASKP3 register.)

enumeratedValue.name: TEMP_STOP
enumeratedValue.description: Temporary stop state triggered by PSE flag of GIF_CTRL register.

enumeratedValue.name: NO_INTERRUPT
enumeratedValue.description: (Initial value) No interrupted transfer via PATH3.

enumeratedValue.name: NO_REQUEST
enumeratedValue.description: (Initial value) No request to wait for processing in PATH3.

enumeratedValue.name: REQUEST
enumeratedValue.description: Request to wait for processing in PATH3.

enumeratedValue.name: NO_REQUEST
enumeratedValue.description: (Initial value) No request to wait for processing in PATH2.

enumeratedValue.name: REQUEST
enumeratedValue.description: Request to wait for processing in PATH2.

enumeratedValue.name: NO_REQUEST
enumeratedValue.description: (Initial value) No request to wait for processing in PATH1.

enumeratedValue.name: REQUEST
enumeratedValue.description: Request to wait for processing in PATH1.

field.name: FQC
field.description: Effective data count in GIF-FIFO (0-16: in qword units).

register.name: GIF_TAG0
register.description: GIFtag (bits 31-16) immediately before. Only accessible when GIF_CTRL PSE is set to 1.

field.name: NLOOP
field.description: Most recently read NLOOP field of GIFtag.

field.name: EOP
field.description: Most recently read EOP flag of GIFtag.

field.name: TAG
field.description: (Undefined) Values from bit 31 to bit 16 among the most recently read GIFtag values.

register.name: GIF_TAG1
register.description: GIFtag (bits 45-32) immediately before. Only accessible when GIF_CTRL PSE is set to 1.

field.name: TAG
field.description: (Undefined) Values from bit 45 to bit 32 among the most recently read GIFtag values.

field.name: PRE
field.description: Most recently read PRE flag of GIFtag.

field.name: PRIM
field.description: Most recently read PRIM field of GIFtag.

field.name: FLG
field.description: Most recently read FLG field of GIFtag.

field.name: NREG
field.description: Most recently read NREG field of GIFtag.

register.name: GIF_TAG2
register.description: GIFtag (bits 95-64) immediately before. Only accessible when GIF_CTRL PSE is set to 1.

field.name: REGS
field.description: Values from bit 95 to bit 64 among most recently read GIFtag values (Lower part of REGS field.)

register.name: GIF_TAG3
register.description: GIFtag (bits 127-96) immediately before. Only accessible when GIF_CTRL PSE is set to 1.

field.name: REGS
field.description: Values from bit 127 to bit 96 among most recently read GIFtag values (Lower part of REGS field.)

register.name: GIF_CNT
register.description: Transfer status counter. Only accessible when GIF_CTRL PSE is set to 1.

field.name: LOOPCNT
field.description: Value of current loop counter (backward counter from GIF_TAG0 NLOOP field). Decremented when starting processing of the GIF_TAG1 NREGSth register descriptor.

field.name: REGCNT
field.description: Register descriptor number (0-15) currently in process (Becomes indeterminate in IMAGE mode). * 1 - Lowest significant register descriptor of REGS field. * 2 - 2nd lowest significant register descriptor of REGS field. .. * 15 - 15th lowest significant register descriptor of REGS field. * 0 - Most significant register descriptor of REGS field.

field.name: VUADDR
field.description: Address of VU memory under transfer.

register.name: GIF_P3CNT
register.description: PATH3 transfer status counter. Only accessible when GIF_CTRL PSE is set to 1.

field.name: P3CNT
field.description: The LOOPCNT field value of the GIF_CNT register when transfer via PATH3 is interrupted. This is not updated in the event of a transfer restart.

register.name: GIF_P3TAG
register.description: PATH3 tag value. Only accessible when GIF_CTRL PSE is set to 1 and when PATH3 is transferring data in IMAGE mode.

field.name: LOOPCNT
field.description: The NLOOP field value of the GIFtag read via PATH3 at the end.

field.name: EOP
field.description: The EOP flag value of the GIFtag read via PATH 3 at the end.

peripheral.name: GS_PRIVILEGED
peripheral.description: Privileged GS registers. Some are accessible via mapped EE addressed, but some require the GIF for accessing the relevant registers on the GS.

register.name: PMODE
register.description: Various PCRTC controls. Accessible via EE.

field.name: CRTMD
field.description: CRT output switching. Always set to 1.

enumeratedValue.name: BLEND_RC1
enumeratedValue.description: Get alpha from output of Read Circuit 1.

field.name: AMOD
field.description: Alpha source to CRTMD chosen output.

enumeratedValue.name: RC1
enumeratedValue.description: Alpha value from Read Circuit 1 for output selection.

enumeratedValue.name: RC2
enumeratedValue.description: Alpha value from Read Circuit 2 for output selection.

enumeratedValue.name: CIRCUIT2
enumeratedValue.description: Blend alpha with output of Read Circuit 2.

register.name: SMODE1
register.description: Video signal settings. Sync parameters for the PCRTC.

field.name: SLCK
field.description: UNKNOWN. Appears to always be set to 0.

field.name: PRST
field.description: Reset the PCRTC circuit. A special procedure should be followed to use properly (see GS Mode Selector app documentation.)

enumeratedValue.name: NOTHING
enumeratedValue.description: (Initial value) Does not trigger a reset.

field.name: SINT
field.description: Activate / Deactivate the Phase Lock Loop (PLL) circuit. A special procedure should be followed to use properly (see GS Mode Selector app documentation.)

enumeratedValue.name: FIELD
enumeratedValue.description: Field mode (every other line is read.)

field.name: VFP
field.description: Vertical front porch. Halflines with colour burst after video data.

field.name: VFPE
field.description: Halflines without colour burst after VFP.

field.name: VBP
field.description: Vertical back porch. Halflines with colour burst after VBPE.

field.name: VBPE
field.description: Halflines without colour burst after VS.

register.name: DISPLAY1
register.description: Rectangular viewport from output of Read Circuit 1.

register.name: DISPLAY2
register.description: Rectangular viewport from output of Read Circuit 1.

enumeratedValue.name: ALPHA
enumeratedValue.description: Write input alpha as-is from alpha channel.

enumeratedValue.name: Y
enumeratedValue.description: Write input alpha as-is from Y colour channel.

enumeratedValue.name: Y_HALF
enumeratedValue.description: Write input alpha as half of Y colour channel.

register.name: CSR
register.description: GS system status and control registers.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLE
enumeratedValue.description: Clear old event and enable new eent.

field.name: EDWINT
field.description: Rectangular area write termination interrupt control.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLE
enumeratedValue.description: Rectangular area write interrupt is enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: NO_HSYNC.
enumeratedValue.description: No rectangular area write interrupt pending.

enumeratedValue.name: RAWRITE_GENERATED.
enumeratedValue.description: Rectangular area write interrupt has been generated.

field.name: FLUSH
field.description: Drawing suspend and FIFO clear (enabled during data write).

enumeratedValue.name: FLUSH
enumeratedValue.description: Flush the GS FIFO and suspend drawing.

enumeratedValue.name: RESET
enumeratedValue.description: GS soft system reset. Clears FIFOs and resets IMR to all 1's.

peripheral.name: VIF
peripheral.description: VU Interface. See EE User's Manual, Chapter 6.

enumeratedValue.name: WAITING
enumeratedValue.description: Waits for data following the VIFcode

enumeratedValue.name: PROCESSING
enumeratedValue.description: Decompressing/Transferring the data following the VIFcode

enumeratedValue.name: ERROR
enumeratedValue.description: Error (DMAtag has been detected in the VIF packet.)

field.name: FQC
field.description: Amount of effective data in the VIF-FIFO

enumeratedValue.name: Waiting
enumeratedValue.description: Waits for data following the VIFcode

enumeratedValue.name: PROCESSING
enumeratedValue.description: Decompressing/Transferring the data following the VIFcode

field.name: VGW
field.description: Status waiting for end of GIF transfer

enumeratedValue.name: WAIT
enumeratedValue.description: Wait (Stopped status with one of FLUSH/FLUSHA, DIRECT/DIRECTHL and MSCALF commands when GIF != idle.)

field.name: DBF
field.description: Double buffer flag. Cleared to 0 by OFFSET and reversed by MSCAL/MSCALF/MSCNT.

enumeratedValue.name: ERROR
enumeratedValue.description: Error (DMAtag has been detected in the VIF packet.)

field.name: FQC
field.description: Amount of effective data in the VIF-FIFO

field.name: RST
field.description: Reset. Resets the whole VIF (including VIF FIFO) when 1 is written.

field.name: FBK
field.description: ForceBreak. Causes a ForceBreak to the VIF when 1 is written. (Stall occurrence)

field.name: STP
field.description: Stop. Stops after end of VIDcode in process when 1 is written. (Stall occurrence)

field.name: STC
field.description: Stall Cancel. Cancels the VIF stall and clears the VSS, VFS, VIS, INT, ER0 and ER1 of the VIF_STAT register to 0 when 1 is written

field.name: MII
field.description: Masks an interrupt by the i bit of the VIFcode

field.name: M1
field.description: Row register value corresponding to the field

field.name: M2
field.description: Col register value corresponding to the write cycle

field.name: M5
field.description: Row register value corresponding to the field

field.name: M6
field.description: Col register value corresponding to the write cycle

field.name: M9
field.description: Row register value corresponding to the field

field.name: M10
field.description: Col register value corresponding to the write cycle

field.name: M13
field.description: Row register value corresponding to the field

field.name: M14
field.description: Col register value corresponding to the write cycle

field.name: R
field.description: Row data for filling when decompressing

field.name: C
field.description: Column data for filling when decompressing

peripheral.name: DMAC
peripheral.description: DMA Controller. See EE User's Manual, Chapter 5.

enumeratedValue.name: CYCLE_8
enumeratedValue.description: Number of cycles to release the bbus to EE core when Cycle Stealing is on

enumeratedValue.name: CYCLE_16
enumeratedValue.description: Number of cycles to release the bbus to EE core when Cycle Stealing is on

enumeratedValue.name: CYCLE_32
enumeratedValue.description: Number of cycles to release the bbus to EE core when Cycle Stealing is on

enumeratedValue.name: CYCLE_64
enumeratedValue.description: Number of cycles to release the bbus to EE core when Cycle Stealing is on

enumeratedValue.name: CYCLE_128
enumeratedValue.description: Number of cycles to release the bbus to EE core when Cycle Stealing is on

enumeratedValue.name: CYCLE_256
enumeratedValue.description: Number of cycles to release the bbus to EE core when Cycle Stealing is on

enumeratedValue.name: OFF
enumeratedValue.description: Does not output applicable channel status to CPCOND[0]

enumeratedValue.name: ON
enumeratedValue.description: Outputs applicable channel status to CPCOND[0]

enumeratedValue.name: OFF
enumeratedValue.description: Does not output applicable channel status to CPCOND[0]

enumeratedValue.name: ON
enumeratedValue.description: Outputs applicable channel status to CPCOND[0]

enumeratedValue.name: OFF
enumeratedValue.description: Does not output applicable channel status to CPCOND[0]

enumeratedValue.name: ON
enumeratedValue.description: Outputs applicable channel status to CPCOND[0]

enumeratedValue.name: OFF
enumeratedValue.description: Does not output applicable channel status to CPCOND[0]

enumeratedValue.name: ON
enumeratedValue.description: Outputs applicable channel status to CPCOND[0]

enumeratedValue.name: OFF
enumeratedValue.description: Does not output applicable channel status to CPCOND[0]

enumeratedValue.name: ON
enumeratedValue.description: Outputs applicable channel status to CPCOND[0]

enumeratedValue.name: OFF
enumeratedValue.description: Does not output applicable channel status to CPCOND[0]

enumeratedValue.name: ON
enumeratedValue.description: Outputs applicable channel status to CPCOND[0]

enumeratedValue.name: OFF
enumeratedValue.description: Does not output applicable channel status to CPCOND[0]

enumeratedValue.name: ON
enumeratedValue.description: Outputs applicable channel status to CPCOND[0]

enumeratedValue.name: OFF
enumeratedValue.description: Does not output applicable channel status to CPCOND[0]

enumeratedValue.name: ON
enumeratedValue.description: Outputs applicable channel status to CPCOND[0]

enumeratedValue.name: OFF
enumeratedValue.description: Does not output applicable channel status to CPCOND[0]

enumeratedValue.name: ON
enumeratedValue.description: Outputs applicable channel status to CPCOND[0]

enumeratedValue.name: OFF
enumeratedValue.description: Does not output applicable channel status to CPCOND[0]

enumeratedValue.name: ON
enumeratedValue.description: Outputs applicable channel status to CPCOND[0]

field.name: SQWC
field.description: Skip quadword counter. Size of the part not transferred (qword)

field.name: TQWC
field.description: Transfer quadword counter. Size of the part transferred (qword)

peripheral.name: INTC
peripheral.description: Interrupt Controller. See EE User's Manual, Chapter 3.

field.name: GS
field.description: Detection of an interrupt from GS

field.name: SBUS
field.description: Detection of an interrupt from a peripheral on SBUS

field.name: VIF0
field.description: VIF0's detection of VIFcode with an interrupt bit or an exception, or VIF0 stalls with occurrence of an interrupt.

field.name: VIF1
field.description: VIF1's detection of VIFcode with an interrupt bit or an exception, or VIF1 stalls with occurrence of an interrupt.

field.name: VU0
field.description: VU0's execution of a microinstruction with an interrupt bit, or VU0 stalls with occurrence of an interrupt.

field.name: VU1
field.description: VU1's execution of a microinstruction with an interrupt bit, or VU1 stalls with occurrence of an interrupt.

field.name: IPU
field.description: IPU's detection of the end of data or an exception IPU stalls with occurrence of an interrupt.

field.name: VU0WD
field.description: VU0 in RUN status for a long time continuously; ForceBreak is sent to VU0.

enumeratedValue.name: Clear
enumeratedValue.description: No VU0 Watchdog interrupt has occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: Set
enumeratedValue.description: A VU0 Watchdog interrupt has occurred.

field.name: PGIF
field.description: DMA channel from IOP for emulating the PS1 GPU

field.name: GS
field.description: Detection of an interrupt from GS

field.name: SBUS
field.description: Detection of an interrupt from a peripheral on SBUS

enumeratedValue.name: Disabled
enumeratedValue.description: Start of V-Blank interrupts are disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: Enabled
enumeratedValue.description: Start of V-Blank interrupts are enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: Disabled
enumeratedValue.description: End of V-Blank interrupts are disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: Enabled
enumeratedValue.description: End of V-Blank interrupts are enabled.

field.name: VIF0
field.description: VIF0's detection of VIFcode with an interrupt bit or an exception, or VIF0 stalls with occurrence of an interrupt.

field.name: VIF1
field.description: VIF1's detection of VIFcode with an interrupt bit or an exception, or VIF1 stalls with occurrence of an interrupt.

field.name: VU0
field.description: VU0's execution of a microinstruction with an interrupt bit, or VU0 stalls with occurrence of an interrupt.

field.name: VU1
field.description: VU1's execution of a microinstruction with an interrupt bit, or VU1 stalls with occurrence of an interrupt.

field.name: IPU
field.description: IPU's detection of the end of data or an exception IPU stalls with occurrence of an interrupt.

field.name: VU0WD
field.description: VU0 in RUN status for a long time continuously; ForceBreak is sent to VU0.

field.name: PGIF
field.description: DMA channel from IOP for emulating the PS1 GPU
